Text: RE Institutional Account Agreement Cc Sara Attached is a revised draft of the Assignment and Assumption Agreement I attach only a clean copy since a blackline would be as confusing as it is helpful Regards Anna Meytina Enron Assign Assumptdoc Original Message From SMTP Sent Friday March PM To Meytina Anna Confidential MemoCounsel Exchange Cc Subject Re Institutional Account Agreement Hi Sara Anna and I have recommended that you call her to give your perspective on an outstanding concern that Anna maintains with respect to the Assignment Agreement Anna and her MD want specifically to discuss the substance of the Exhibit that you would like to attach to the Agreement Call me first so that if I am not at lunch I am leaving for a late lunch in the next fifteen minutes I can join in Otherwise please call Anna directly at Cheryl Nelson Senior Counsel EB Enron Assign Assumptdoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

FW Enron Credit Inc Revised Guarantyattach an execution copy of the guarantee Regards Anna Meytina Original Message From Meytina Anna Confidential MemoCounsel Exchange Sent Tuesday March PM To Subject Enron Credit Inc Revised Guaranty Cheryl Attached please find an execution copy of the guaranty Regards Anna Meytina BS FINALCleandoc BS FINALCleandoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

FW Institutional Account Agreement Cc Per your request please see attached Regards Anna Meytina Original Message From Meytina Anna Confidential MemoCounsel Exchange Sent Friday March AM To Subject Institutional Account Agreement Cheryl Attached please find marked and clean copy of the Institutional Account Agreement Regards Anna Meytina IAAdoc IAAcleandoc IAAdoc IAAcleandoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

Institutional Account Agreementand Cheryl Attached is the revised institutional account agreement blacklined to reflect the most recent revisions together with a clean copy Please call if you have any questions Cheryl I have not received your markup of the assignment and assumption agreement Please resend Thank you Anna Meytina IAAblackdoc IAAcleandoc IAAblackdoc IAAcleandoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

RE corporate guaranty Cc Per our conversation attached please find i a black lined version of the Guaranty marked to show our changes and ii the marked and clean Institutional Account Agreement Please call us once you have had a chance to review the attached documents Regards Anna Meytina Guaranty Bear Stearns Enron Corp Formdoc IAAdoc IAAexecutiondoc Original Message From SMTP Sent Thursday February PM To Subject corporate guaranty Anna Attached is the form of Enron corp guaranty See attached file Guaranty Bear Stearns Enron Corp Formdoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax File Guaranty Bear Stearns Enron Corp Formdoc Guaranty Bear Stearns Enron Corp Formdoc IAAdoc IAAexecutiondoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

Enron Guaranty Cc Clement Attached for your review is the revised Guaranty clean and marked against the version dated February Please advise if the Guarantee is now in order and if so you may proceed to have it signed and returned to us Regards Anna Meytina BS DRAFT MARKEDdoc BS FINALCLEANdoc BS DRAFT MARKEDdoc BS FINALCLEANdoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

RE Enron Guaranty Cc Thank you for your email I attach the revised documents BS DRAFT MARKEDdoc BS FinalCleandoc Original Message From SMTP Sent Friday February PM To Cc Subject Re Enron Guaranty In Section the third paragraph the reference prior to the deletion should read the Counterparty and not a Counterparty Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Meytina Anna To Confidential MemoCounsel cc Talento Scott Exchange Chernick Exchange Sharon Confidential MemoCounsel Exchange ea Miron Russel Exchange rcom Subject Enron Guaranty AM Sara and Clement Attached for your review is the revised Guaranty clean and marked against the version dated February Please advise if the Guarantee is now in order and if so you may proceed to have it signed and returned to us Regards Anna Meytina BS DRAFT MARKEDdoc BS FINALCLEANdoc See attached file BS DRAFT MARKEDdoc See attached file BS FINALCLEANdoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication File BS DRAFT MARKEDdoc File BS FINALCLEANdoc BS DRAFT MARKEDdoc BS FinalCleandoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

Enron Guarantyand Clement In addition to the form of guarantee we need to obtain from you evidence that the guarantor has the power and authority to issue the guarantee and that the signatory is authorized to sign I attach a sample form of corporate resolutions which I hope will be acceptable to you Please call me to discuss at Thanks and regards Anna Meytina CorpResdoc CorpResdoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

Securities Loan AgreementThank you for your email Attached please find the revised draft of the Guarantee BS FinalCMarkeddoc Listed below are the addresses for notices Robert Brunson Stock Loans Bear Stearns Securities Corp One Metrotech Center North Brooklyn New York tel and General Counsel The Bear Stearns Companies Inc Park Avenue New York New York Regards Anna Meytina BS FinalCMarkeddoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

Execution Copy of the GuaranteePer our conversation attached please find a copy of the revised guarantee Regards Anna Meytina BS FINALdoc BS FINALdoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

RE Execution Copy of the Guarantyplease find an execution copy of the Guaranty Anna BS FINALdoc Original Message From SMTP Sent Tuesday February PM To Subject Re Execution Copy of the Guarantee Importance High Per my voice mail see Par second paragraph therein Beneficiarys is the correct word Your immediate reply is appreciated Sara Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Meytina Anna To Confidential cc MemoCounsel Subject Execution Copy of the Guarantee Exchange ea rcom AM Sara Per our conversation attached please find a copy of the revised guarantee Regards Anna Meytina BS FINALdoc See attached file BS FINALdoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication File BS FINALdoc BS FINALdoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

Assumption and Assignment AgreementAttached please find a copy of the assumtion and assignment agreement for your review and comment I also attach the revised guarantee marked to show changes from our prior version After you have had an opportunity to review these documents please let me know how you would like to proceed Regards Anna ASSIGNdoc BS FINALMARKEDdoc Original Message From SMTP Sent Wednesday February PM To Subject Securities Loan Agreement Anna I just received your voice mail The package including the Enron Corp guaranty has already gone out via Federal Express to your attention You should receive it tomorrow Also Enron North America Corp would like to assign the agreement to Enron Credit Inc a Delaware corporation Would you like for me to prepare the assignment or shall I Please advise Thanks Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax ASSIGNdoc BS FINALMARKEDdoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication

RE corporate guaranty and INSTITUTIONAL ACCOUNT AGREEMENTThe new account agreement is marked up to reflect the concessions we gave to you in the existing agreement with ENA and it is marked against our current version of the Institutional Account Agreement Please do not hesitate to call me at with any questions Regards Anna Original Message From SMTP Sent Thursday March PM To Subject RE corporate guaranty and INSTITUTIONAL ACCOUNT AGREEMENT Anna As promised I am reviewing your new form of account agreement as well as the assignment Can you please tell me WHAT document the new account agreement was marked against It is not marked against ENAs existing agreement dated January Regards Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Meytina Anna To Confidential cc Chernick Sharon Confidential MemoCounsel Exchange MemoCounsel Exchange Subject RE corporate guaranty ea rcom PM Sara Per our conversation attached please find i a black lined version of the Guaranty marked to show our changes and ii the marked and clean Institutional Account Agreement Please call us once you have had a chance to review the attached documents Regards Anna Meytina
